cssid.label: CSS ID
cssid.description: (optional) Sets a CSS ID on the widget so you can apply your own styling.

logoTemplate.label: Logo template
logoTemplate.description: Name of template file used to generate logos http://feefo.com/feefo/selectlogotemplate.jsp

sku.label: Sku
sku.description: Specify a sku code for the widget explicitly. When Detect Sku Automatically = Yes, this will only be used if no automatic sku found.

detect_sku.label: Detect Sku Automatically
detect_sku.description: (optional) It will try to detect relevant sku and apply Product filter, this apply only inside Product related blocks.

category.label: Business Category
category.description: Specify a Business Category code for the widget explicitly. When Detect Business Category Automatically = Yes, this will only be used if no automatic Business Category found.

detect_category.label: Detect Business Category Automatically
detect_category.description: (optional) It will try to detect relevant Business Category and apply Product filter, this apply only inside Catebory related blocks.

mode.label: Review Types to Include
mode.description: Determine which comments will be shown in reviews.

order.label: Date Order
order.description: Determines date order that reviews are presented.

since.label: Since
since.description: Amount of history to include is logo queries.

limit.label: Limit
limit.description: Number of review results to return. Default value = 50.

additional.label: Additional parameters (optional)
additional.description: Sometimes specified by Feefo for additional information. Example: &param=value&param2=value2
